description: Try our easy to follow Date & Walnut Rolada recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Date & Walnut Rolada Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g dates, stone removed, roughly chopped (approx. 20 dates)
0.5 cup lemon juice (you will need 2 large lemons)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dates, sugar, lemon juice and honey into a non-stick saucepan over medium heat.
Cook, stirring constantly until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil.
Simmer for 20 minutes or until all liquid has evaporated and mixture becomes thick and stiff.
Remove from heat and fold in walnuts. Cool.
Transfer to a sheet of baking paper and form into a log, 5cm thick and 18cm long.
Cut into thin slices and serve with cheese.
